name: Syd Field Character Qualities
description: Identify these four qualities acclaimed screenwriter Syd Field believes all great characters must have

attributes.name: Dramatic Need
attributes.description: What drives the character? What do they want to win, gain, obtain, or achieve?

attributes.name: Strong Point of View
attributes.description: What is the character's unique point of view? What do they believe that could generate conflict?

attributes.name: Attitude
attributes.description: What are the character's mannerisms, behaviors, and feelings? How do these reveal their attitude?

attributes.name: Change
attributes.description: How does the character change? Is their need, point of view, or attitude transformed by the story's end?
